poem:
Title: Echoes of Unsettling Policy

Labour, green, September's convergence,
Liverpool's stage, hope's emergence.
Kwarteng's blunder, markets plunged,
Truss's trial, faith expunged.

In turmoil, interest and mortgage so sorry,
The pound's descent in a scurry.
Shadowed cabinet under Starmer's sky,
In disarray, future's promise denies.

Oh, remember, turn not in despair,
For in every fall blooms repair.
